column18: 02/04/2016: Assailants threw two Molotov cocktails at the office of Social Development Minister Anne Tolley in Whakatane, Bay of Plenty, New Zealand. There were no casualties. No group claimed responsibility for the incident; however, sources stated that the attack was carried out in protest of the Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP).
column64: The specific motive is unknown; however, sources posited that the attack was carried out in opposition to the Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP).
column97: Two Molotov cocktails were used in the attack.
column108: An office was damaged in this attack.
